summary: A command‑line training script that loads multi‑body dynamics datasets, builds graph‑based neural models (interaction network, MLP, preprocessing layers) with PyTorch and DGL, runs a training loop, evaluates performance, and can generate video visualizations of the simulated trajectories.
business_intent: Enable researchers or engineers to train and assess graph neural network models for physics‑based multi‑body simulation, supporting model development, benchmarking, and visual result inspection.
